devdoc.details: It interracts with the Brand Smart Contract to add their details in brands array & check for their warranty period.
devdoc.title: Admin Smart Contract

checkUpkeep(bytes).notice: Overriden by the KeepersInterface, the returned value must be true to run performUpKeep.

performUpkeep(bytes).notice: After checkUpkeep returns true, it updates the warranty of all brands in the array.

userdoc.notice: This contract is only accessable by someone in authority and can be used to check & maintain brands that provide nft warranties.
